title: What app would you download? - Quora

response.answer_text: Evernote - for my electronic documents management and many more DigiLocker - to access my goverment and most important documents ( documents like 12,10th marksheet , driving licence, aadhar card) to access them anytime anywhere Telegram - If you don't know about telegram in 2020 then please give a try , this is the most powerful messenger application in the android and IOS, In telegram you can chat as well as download movies and other stuff (personally recommend)🤫 Spotify- if you're a music lover, you know what the spotify is, you can find all the songs in Spotify Zedge - this application give you the access of millions awesome wallpaper and ringtone, if you love to change your wallpaper to often Google rewards - by simply giving some survey answer you can win Google Play credit, which can be used in any app purchase Quora- just download this amazing app Some common application - Facebook , whatsapp, Google pay, instagram
